clinical_study.brief_title: A Brief Laboratory-Based Hypnosis Session for Pain in Sickle Cell Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Brief Laboratory-Based Hypnosis Session for Pain in Sickle Cell Disease

brief_summary.textblock: This pilot study will assess the effects of a brief laboratory-based guided imagery procedure on responses to pain in patients with sickle cell disease (SCD) and healthy controls.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in heart rate variability (HRV) before, during, and after hypnosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Beginning 15 minutes prior to hypnosis session, continuing during 15 minutes of hypnosis, Ending 15 minutes after the hypnosis session

primary_outcome.measure: Change in galvanic skin response (GSR) before, during, and after hypnosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Beginning 15 minutes prior to hypnosis session, continuing during 15 minutes of hypnosis, Ending 15 minutes after the hypnosis session

primary_outcome.measure: Change in overall respiration rate and rate of deep breathing (sighs) before, during, and after hypnosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Beginning 15 minutes prior to hypnosis session, continuing during 15 minutes of hypnosis, Ending 15 minutes after the hypnosis session

primary_outcome.measure: Change in peripheral blood flow (pulse oximetry) before, during, and after hypnosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: Beginning 15 minutes prior to hypnosis session, continuing during 15 minutes of hypnosis, Ending 15 minutes after the hypnosis session

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 minutes before beginning of hypnosis session and 1 minute after end of hypnosis session
9 minutes before beginning of hypnosis session and 4 minutes after end of hypnosis session

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in heat pulse pain ratings
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5 minutes before beginning of hypnosis session and 7 minutes after end of hypnosis session

arm_group.description: Brief guided imagery session with a trained clinician focused on relaxation and pleasant imagery.
Brief guided imagery session with a trained clinician focused on relaxation and pleasant imagery.

intervention.description: Brief guided imagery session with a trained clinician focused on relaxation and pleasant imagery.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Healthy control or with a diagnosis of sickle cell disease
2. Age 13 or older
3. African-American
4. Subject is able to provide informed signed consent
5. Subject is able to follow instructions
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Any known acute or chronic illness that in the judgment of the investigator, may compromise subject safety or data integrity
2. Neurologic disorders affecting sensation
3. Skin abnormality/abrasion over sites of stimulus
4. Under 13 years of age
5. Unable to follow instructions
